long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
You sometimes get out of focus.
You sometimes wander on the internet.
You sometimes do other things than what you should.

That's okay. Don't worry. There is no shame.
There is a solution to that. 

You need Shia LaBeouf.
Everyone needs a Shia.

You need him were it matters the most.
You need him on Google.

-----------------------------------------------------
1. Install the plugin
2. Go to https://www.google.com
3. Just do it. (click anywhere for sound)
-----------------------------------------------------
